--- title: "Interactive Bash via Binder + Thebe" description: "Quarto page with a live Bash shell v9" format: html: thebe: true ---
Click **Live Code** → then the **Run** ▶️ button in the cell. This starts a Binder session that runs a **Bash Jupyter kernel**. ::: {#5da7ef21 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.bash .cell-code} # Try a few shell commands: uname -a pwd ls -la echo "Hello from Bash on Binder!" ``` :::
